channel.title: How to stop client cheaters?
channel.description:
Well I want it so I can make it so the server only allows the client I made for the server. I really want this because I don't want noclipers on my server. The server already has this coded but I don't know how to get it so it allows the client I have now to the server because the server is attached to a different one.
Please help!

item.title: How to stop client cheaters?
item.dc:creator: @jackboy89 jackboy89
item.description:
@jackboy89 wrote:

Noclip is for owners only. They use some cheat clients to noclip.

Read full topic

item.title: How to stop client cheaters?
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

The server already has this coded but I don’t know how to get it so it allows the client I have now to the server because the server is attached to a different one.

Please help![/quote]
Just make it so you can’t noclip?

Read full topic
